note.p: Clergyman. Minister of the Independent Chapel at South Bar, Banbury, Oxfordshire, 1869. Ordained, 1870. Curate of St Thomas’s, Lambeth, 1869–70; of St Margaret’s, Birmingham, 1870–5; vicar of St Margaret’s, 1875–90; of Ogley-Hay, 1890–3; of St Mark’s, Liverpool, 1893–1909.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858-1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 February 2015)
London Metropolitan Archives, St Pancras, Register of Baptism, p90/pan1, Item 020
Post Office directory of Northamptonshire etc. 1869.
